package.description: 为内联合并冲突提供高亮和命令。
package.config.title: 合并冲突
package.config.autoNavigateNextConflictEnabled: 是否在解决合并冲突后自动转到下一个合并冲突。
package.config.codeLensEnabled: 为编辑器中的合并冲突区域创建 CodeLens。
package.config.decoratorsEnabled: 为编辑器中的合并冲突区域创建提示小标。
package.config.diffViewPosition: Controls where the diff view should be opened when comparing changes in merge conflicts.
package.config.diffViewPosition.current: Open the diff view in the current editor group.
package.config.diffViewPosition.beside: Open the diff view next to the current editor group.
package.config.diffViewPosition.below: Open the diff view below the current editor group.

out/commandHandler.cursorNotInConflict: 编辑器光标不在合并冲突内
out/commandHandler.cursorOnCommonAncestorsRange: 编辑器光标在共同来源块上，请将其移动至“当前”或“传入”区域中
out/commandHandler.cursorOnSplitterRange: 编辑器光标在合并冲突分割线上，请将其移动至“当前”或“传入”区域中
out/commandHandler.noConflicts: 没有在此文件中找到合并冲突
out/commandHandler.noOtherConflictsInThisFile: 此文件中没有其他合并冲突了
